name: Remote Angular Frontend Developer (Senior)
description:
Looking to work with the latest technologies in Big Data for an award-winning software company? Smart Apartment Data is an employee-rated five start employer. We are looking for an experienced Angular Frontend Web Developer to help build our next generation of software products. As a winner of the ‘Houston Best & Brightest Companies to Work for ‘, we place strong emphasis on offering a fun work-environment, generous pay with bonuses, and a healthy work-life balance.

Responsibilities

  • Help create technical direction for the team
  • Solid understanding of Frontend and Angular 9+
  • Extensive experience with web development and best practices

Benefits

  • 100% Remote with flexible work hours
  • Competitive base salary with guaranteed annual bonus
  • Work with Senior Developers using the latest web technologies
  • Fun Culture – see our Glassdoor reviews here: https://www.glassdoor.com/Reviews/SMART-Apartment-Data-Reviews-E1004409.htm

Requirements

  • 3+ years experience as a front-end developer. Minimum 2 years with Angular 6+
  • Strong understanding of HTML/CSS/JS
  • Some experience with back-end development is a plus but not required
